An old but gold. This game was one of the first FPSs I had experienced. I bought an old cd-rom copy from a sweaty street vendor at a Flea Market. I said, "$5.00, worth the shot." Played it, expecting it to be some trash game from my parent's lifetime. I was only Half-Right. 

For it's time, Half-Life really pushed boundaries. The FPS genre would be undoubtedly different today, if it hadn't been for Doom, Quake, and Half-Life. Doom mainstreamed the conventional FPS design, Quake elaborated upon this with an updated engine (particle physics, lighting improvements, 3-dimensional characters with actual polygons) and brilliant game-play experimentation (rocket jumping, low gravity, multi-platforming). Half-Life built upon the Quake engine to create something that many players were probably craving the most--story-driven game-play. 

It might seem conventional now, but most FPSs of the time were scarce on story-building. Many argue that if it weren't for Half-Life's experimentation with "cinematic" story-telling, the Call of Duty franchise would not be the hulking franchise that it is today.
Half-Kino (half of it isn't very polished)

Half life was a revolutionary shooter for it's time, but playing it in 2019 or later feels super dated. The game is a start to finish mess, with abysmally aged textures and frustratingly unclear puzzles. The game gets very slow during certain points, and many objectives during a playthrough are very poorly communicated to the player. These issues seriously bog down the gameplay. Would not recommend beyond story context for half life 2, but even then you can start the series at 2 and get a full grasp of the lore without having to play this heap.

One of the best first person shooters ever created. 20 years after release, this game still totally stands on its own today. Graphics are good (low poly, low res, but you can still appreciate them), gameplay is excellent (that's what the game is famous for), sound design is memorable and really adds a lot to the experience... Don't play it if you're casual, play Black Mesa instead. But you can't really call yourself a PC gamer without having played Half-Life.
Un clásico , siempre demostrando el gran juego que es . Totalmente Recomendado :steamhappy:
The story so far is amazing and even though I'm playing this for the first time in 2019 I would like to say it still holds up. If you love FPS and Sci-fi games this is the game for you.

Ой, да что тут писать? Это же легендарная игра, классика, шедевр, можно продолжать дальше, но это так.
В эту игру я начал играть ещё далеко до появления моего первого компьютера, ходили к соседям, в клубы. 
В далёком 2001 году я познакомился с этой игрой благодаря клубу и кс 1,5. Мы все играли как умели, лазили по ассауту, меншену, ацтеку, дедасту. В один прекрасный день я спросил своих братьев по оружию, а почему мы никогда не заходим играть в hf? Напомню, что в игре есть переключение между Кс и Хф. Зашли, создали уровень, побегали, удивились оружию ну и в целом через недельку забросили обратно на Кс. Но я начал проходить сюжетную игру Хф и с тех пор переигрывал в неё больше 50-ти раз. Участвовал в спидране, личный рекорд на тот момент был 84 минуты. Спустя столько лет, находясь далеко от дома, имя на руках МакПро, я увидел возможность установки Хф на МакОс. И сейчас прохожу заново это великую игру.
По делу: игра объемная, куча уровней, куча врагов, присутствуют, как бы щас назвали "мини игры", где-то нужно обойти, где-то подождать, где-то рискнуть. Помню, что по началу её прохождение составляло 15-20 часов. Играйте в Хф! Я уверен весь мир знает эту игру. Как и её ничуть не великое продолжение - Хф2. Всем играть! Однозначно 10 хедкрабов из 10.
This really was a breaking point in video games. 10/10.
КРАБИКИ! ВОРТИГОНТЫ! ГРАНТЫ! ЕЩЕ КАКИЕ-ТО ЧУДИЛЫ И ВОЕННЫЕ ИДИОТЫ С ТУПЫМИ ГОЛОВО-ДРОБИТЕЛЬНЫМИ ЛАБИРИНТАМИ/ГОЛОВОЛОМКАМИ ПО ЧЕРНОЙ МЕЗЕ И ЗЕНУ - ЭТО ХАЛФ-ЛАЙФ!

I played it 16 hours at hard and it's a really nice game.
It's older now and maybe for some people that prefer new graphics not the best choice, but I really like the graphic, it reminds me of the older games I played as a kid, so the game on it's own too.
It's worth buying it, especially on a sale. 
To the difficulty: Playing on hard, feels really like playing on hard (What's very nice)
If you wanna play a Single Player Shooter that is difficult enough (Especially on the difficult hard), then try it.

I really like this game, it's very impressive for its time and even today it's still a very good game.

But for me personally, it's a little too difficult. Even on easy difficulty, beating the final boss feels like an impossible job and a tedious waste of time. I've even been cheating items in, but if I really wanted to beat this guy, I'd have to be invincible.

And I know, I'm a terrible gamer, so it's probably just me. But why do games have to be so tedious sometimes?

Anyway, I'd still recommend playing this game, because it's still a lot of fun.

ugh. the physics in this game haven't aged well at all. if I played this when I was much younger, I'd definitely have enjoyed it more, but having beaten Half Life 2 and several other first person shooters with much better controls and balancing... phew, this one's showing its age. going to play through HL:Source next. hopefully, that's leagues better.

Que más a todos, este juego de disparos en primera persona me parece un buen juego, al ser de una época que no tiene gráficos excelentes, pero tiene una jugabilidad que en sus momentos te desquicia, ya que tu raje es muy rápido y te desorientas muy rápido.
Por lo demás es un buen juego un poco lineal, solo sigues el recorrido y listo. Te la pasas de maravillas si no te importa morir muchas veces.

One of the best and most influential shooters ever made, along with Doom. A timeless masterpiece that still holds up today despite some flaws. An essential title that everyone who likes video games should play.
